Name: Sarcophagus Lid
Description: This fragment of sarcophagus lid is divided into two registers. The first carries a formula in hieroglyphs which is a part of the "Book of Glorifications",  a collection of ritual texts dating to the Late Period and Graeco-Roman Periods. The second is composed of funerary texts and small "vignettes", representing the "genii"  or divine beings who each played an important role during the different funerary phases.
